kw.name: Create Session
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=my_api, url=http://127.0.0.1:5000, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server

kw.name: GET On Session
kw.msg: GET Request : url=http://127.0.0.1:5000/getcode path_url=/getcode headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.32.3', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive'} body=None

GET Response : url=http://127.0.0.1:5000/getcode status=200, reason=OK headers={'Server': 'Werkzeug/3.0.4 Python/3.12.4', 'Date': 'Sat, 21 Sep 2024 15:25:53 GMT', 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Content-Length': '27', 'Connection': 'close'} body="Random number or message"
kw.doc: Sends a GET request on a previously created HTTP Session.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Numbers
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to real numbers.

kw.name: Should Be Equal
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: GET On Session
kw.msg: GET Request : url=http://127.0.0.1:5000/plus/2/2 path_url=/plus/2/2 headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.32.3', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive'} body=None

GET Response : url=http://127.0.0.1:5000/plus/2/2 status=200, reason=OK headers={'Server': 'Werkzeug/3.0.4 Python/3.12.4', 'Date': 'Sat, 21 Sep 2024 15:25:53 GMT', 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Content-Length': '2', 'Connection': 'close'} body=4
kw.doc: Sends a GET request on a previously created HTTP Session.

kw.name: Status Should Be
kw.doc: Fails if response status code is different than the expected.

kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to real numbers.

kw.name: GET On Session
kw.msg: GET Request : url=http://127.0.0.1:5000/plus/2/2+1 path_url=/plus/2/2+1 headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.32.3', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive'} body=None

could not convert string to float: '2+1'
